title: Charlatan's Orb
data:
{{version032}} {{stub}} {{flavour|This orb is the work of a master artificer, contracted to retrieve the orb, who valued their life more than their professional integrity. While this fake faithfully recreates the eerie glow and space-warping properties of the true orb, the power it grants is artificial and only accessible to skilled evokers.}} [[File:Urand charlatan's orb.png]] '''''the Charlatan's Orb''''' [[Orb]]
Reduces your [[stealth]]
Increases [[scroll of teleport]] delay by 5-9 turns (as if you held the real [[Orb of Zot#Ascension|Orb of Zot]])
Boosts your other [[skill]]s by 20% of your base [[Evocations]] skill ==Desirability== Delaying your teleports is very dangerous, though this orb's skill boost can help those with high Evocations. ==History== *This unrand was added in [[0.32]]. [[Category:Unrands]]
